description.value:
You join a primal order of xenodruids with ties to nature and the biodiversity of the Universe, such as the Xenowardens. Choose one of the following xenodruid orders.

Order Animal; Skill Animal Lore; Spells 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Pest Form]; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Animal Form]; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Carcinization]

Order Plant; Skill Plant Lore; Spells 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Summon Plant or Fungus]; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Verdant Code]; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Plant Form]

Order Viral; Skill Genealogy Lore; Spells 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Detect Poison]; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Instant Virus]; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Toxic Cloud]

You become trained in the listed skill associated with the order and add the listed spells to your spell list and spell repertoire as signature spells. If you were already trained in the listed skill, you instead become trained in another skill of your choice.
